data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 244,000 citizens of Krong Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Krong Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Krong Preah Sihanouk that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Krong Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Krong Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Burmese people. Make the Burmese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Krong Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 239,009 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Krong Preah Sihanouk who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,990 believers in Krong Preah Sihanouk that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Krong Preah Sihanouk
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Hakka, Cham, Western, Khmer Krom, Malay, Chong
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Hakka (600), Cham, Western (252,000), Khmer Krom (280,000), Malay (17,000), Chong (1,600)
